name: Magic: The Gathering Arena
summary: Magic: The Gathering Arena is a free-to-play digital collectible card game being developed by Wizards of the Coast's internal development studio, Wizards Digital Games Studio. The game is a digital adaption of Magic: The Gathering card game, allowing players to gain cards through booster packs, in-game achievements or microtransaction purchases, and build their own decks to challenge other players.
info:
• 中文名: 万智牌：竞技场
  • 别名: MTGA
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: CCG
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 发行日期: 2019年9月26日
  • 售价: Free
  • 官方网站: https://magic.wizards.com/en/mtgarena
  • 开发: Wizards Digital Games Studio
  • 发行: Wizards of the Coast
